restaurant_leads.name: Augustiner-Keller
restaurant_leads.notes: Popular beer garden with many reviews - good candidate for review management

for_birdeye_users: Frustrated with 12-month contracts? ReviewResponder is month-to-month.
Paying for features you don't use? We focus on one thing: AI review responses.
Not getting enough reviews? Our outreach system helps you get more.
Slow support? We respond within hours, not days.
for_restaurants: I noticed your restaurant has [X] reviews on Yelp/TripAdvisor.
Responding to every review is time-consuming - AI can help.
Professional responses improve your online reputation.

next_steps: LinkedIn search for reviewer names from G2
More TripAdvisor/Yelp restaurants with contact info
Email outreach with personalized pain-point messaging
